the important thing to remember here is

this card really should be green.

Posted By: rollinsclone (12/18/2012 11:16:47 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Boon Cycle from highest to lowest power level  
Best:[Ancestral Recall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ancestral Recall)  
2nd:[Dark Ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Ritual)  
3rd:[Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt)  
4th:[Giant Growth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Giant Growth)  
Worst:[Healing Salve](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Healing Salve)  
  
Lightning bolt was probably better during alpha simply because there weren't many powerful 3 drops to ritual into. You would probably ritual into [juzam djinn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=juzam djinn) on turn 2 at absolute best. Either way, this cycle is grossly powerful except for [healing salve](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=healing salve) which is just terrible lol.
posts.html:
Boon Cycle from highest to lowest power level
Best:Ancestral Recall
2nd:Dark Ritual
3rd:Lightning Bolt
4th:Giant Growth
Worst:Healing Salve

Lightning bolt was probably better during alpha simply because there weren't many powerful 3 drops to ritual into. You would probably ritual into juzam djinn on turn 2 at absolute best. Either way, this cycle is grossly powerful except for healing salve which is just terrible lol.
